Description:
The Borlaug Institute for South Asia (BISA) is a non-profit international research institute dedicated to food, nutrition, and livelihood security as well as environmental rehabilitation in South Asia, which is home to more than 300 million undernourished people. BISA is a collaborative effort involving CIMMYT and the Indian Council for Agricultural Research (ICAR). Please refer to this website for more information: http://bisa.org/.We are seeking dynamic, innovative, self-motivated, and service-oriented professional for the position of Project Coordinator.The position will be based in Patna.The main responsibilities of this position will be:Coordinate and support Project partners to excute project activities in all 38 districts of Bihar.
Coordinate and collect the informations related physical and financial progress of the project and provide the required reports to the donar.
Develop project guidelines, advisories and project reports.
Regular monitoring of the project activities, organising meetings (skype/personel) and regular reporting of overall project progress to the project steering committee chairman and supervisor.
Develop the good liaising with the state government, universities, ICAR, KVK, NGO etc
Perform support activities that are required in BISA-CIMMYT, according to the instructions of your supervisor.Job Details
